comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Gabrielle Dorziat (ck spelling), French actress, helped popularize Coco Chanel's designs, toured the US to raise money during WWI for war refugees. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabrielle_Dorziat

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thanks for noting the correct spelling for Dorziat.  We'll include this correction next time we update.
